name: Fast-Food-Fast
description: Fast-Food_Fast is a food delivery service for a restaurant
author: eltNEG <yorewole@gmail.com>

scripts.cov: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --  -R spec dist/test/*.js
scripts.coverage: npm run build && ./node_modules/.bin/istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --  -R spec dist/test/*.js && cat ./coverage/lcov.info | node ./node_modules/coveralls/bin/coveralls.js && npm run clean || npm run clean
